title: Sans serif full face to work with Sackers Gothic.
content:
I am looking for a complete typeface to work with Sackers Gothic.  
Or better yet, a complete typeface that is similar to sackers gothic.

 [‹ Need help on identifying this typeface](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102112239/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38579 "Go to previous forum topic") [Chaparral-like fonts? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102112239/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38561 "Go to next forum topic")
author: moremilk

comments.content:
Thanks. I’ll check it out.  
Could also be a face that works well with sackers but is not necessarily a wide set face.

A complete typeface that is similar to sackers gothic:

[Proxima Nova](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102112239/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/mark_simonson/proxima_nova_complete_ot/)  
 [Maple](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102112239/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/process/maple_ot/)  
 [ARS Maquette](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102112239/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/arstype/maquette/)  
 [Titling Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102112239/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/font_bureau/titling_gothic_normal/)  
 [FF Bau](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102112239/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=Bau)  
 [Trade Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102112239/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/linotype/trade_gothic_virtual/)  
 [ARS Region](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102112239/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/arstype/region/)
